evidence.source_document: Class Action Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: These terminations and suspensions occurred pursuant to Executive Orders or other directives of Defendant President Donald J. Trump, issued from January 20, 2025 to present, that were implemented through Defendant Department of Government Efficiency (“DOGE”) and then operationalized by myriad administrative agencies.

extracted.value: Executive Orders issued by President Donald J. Trump, issued from January 20, 2025 to present, that were implemented through Defendant Department of Government Efficiency (“DOGE”) and then operationalized by myriad administrative agencies.

evidence.source_document: Class Action Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: The agencies that terminated grants did so on a categorical, en masse basis, without individual review or regard to a project’s merit or a grantee’s progress, and without any semblance of due process.

extracted.value: Federal agencies terminated thousands of previously awarded research grants on a categorical, en masse basis, without individual review or regard to project merit or grantee progress, and without any semblance of due process.
